name: @dotbit/plugin-web3mq
description: This is an official plugin integrating the brilliant [Web3MQ](https://www.web3messaging.online/) with .bit.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npx only-allow pnpm && npm run build
scripts.postversion: genversion src/version.ts --es6 && git add src/version.ts package.json && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:esm && npm run build:commonjs
